root: ^they say they appeared in the land of man before ancient times...
^they possessed supernatural abilities that defies logic
^with their abilities, they managed to turn inhabitable lands into prosperity and helped humanity build their lands around the world
^they only asked for one thing in return...
^to stay hidden from humans forever so they can stay hidden and slumber in peace...
^and ever since then, No human has ever laid their eyes on them for millenniums...
